document_data.mainbody:
Ellahana Raikeil was a legendary elven castle found deep within the Moonwood in Luruar.
The castle once housed the Crown of Joy and Tears which was experimented on by the Knights of the Unicorn. The Knights returned the Crown to where they found it upon their departure from the castle.
Ellahana Raikeil was filled with riddles and puzzles. Upon solving one of these obstacles, an observer would witness the image of a silver unicorn that would solidify a little bit more with each riddle solved.
